message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to get a good deal, and I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $82.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78? I really like the product and would love to make a deal with you.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $81?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $79? I really like the product and would love to make a deal with you.
